properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the relationship-aware query module.

properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.enable-vector-search
properties.description: When true the orchestrator may call vector search for semantic reranking.

properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.default-similarity-threshold
properties.description: Default cosine similarity threshold used when semantic ranking is active.

properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.max-traversal-depth
properties.description: Maximum number of relationships that can be traversed for a single query.

properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.query-cache-ttl-seconds
properties.description: Time-to-live for cached relationship query plans (seconds).

properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.default-return-mode
properties.description: Controls whether IDs or full entities are returned when callers do not override.

properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.llm.temperature
properties.description: Base temperature passed to the LLM planner.

properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.schema.auto-discover
properties.description: Automatically discover @AICapable entities and relationships at startup.

properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.cache.enabled
properties.description: Enable in-memory caching for query plans, embeddings, and results.

properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.cache.plan.max-entries
properties.description: Maximum number of cached RelationshipQueryPlan entries.

properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.cache.result.ttl-seconds
properties.description: Time-to-live (seconds) for cached JPQL result sets.

properties.name: ai.infrastructure.relationship.cache.result.max-entries
properties.description: Maximum number of cached JPQL result sets.
